title: Real-Time Health Monitoring Dashboard
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to have a real-time health monitoring dashboard so that I can efficiently track my patients' vital signs and respond promptly to any health changes.

title: Customizable Alert System for Anomalies
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want a customizable alert system for monitoring my patients' health anomalies so that I can respond promptly and provide timely interventions, ensuring their safety and well-being.

title: Secure Data Access for Caregivers
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want secure access to my patients' health data so that I can monitor their health status efficiently and provide timely interventions while respecting their privacy.

title: Integrated Communication Tools for Health Updates
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to use integrated communication tools to receive real-time health updates from my patients so that I can efficiently monitor their well-being and respond promptly to any changes.

title: Personalized Care Task Management Interface
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want a personalized care task management interface so that I can efficiently monitor my patients' health, track their medication, and coordinate care remotely, ensuring timely interventions and maintaining connection with those who are socially isolated.

title: User Consent Management for Data Sharing
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to manage user consent for data sharing so that I can respect my patients' privacy while accessing their health information for effective care.

title: Simplified Setup Process for Caregiver Access
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want a straightforward setup process for accessing ALFRED so that I can efficiently monitor my patients' health without the burden of complicated configurations.

title: Health Data Visualization for Easy Interpretation
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to easily interpret my patients' health data through visual representations, so that I can efficiently monitor their vital signs and detect any changes in their health status promptly.

title: Medication Management and Reminder System
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to manage medication schedules and send reminders to my patients, so that I can ensure they take their medications on time and maintain their health effectively.

title: Training Resources for Caregivers on ALFRED Usage
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want access to comprehensive training resources for using ALFRED effectively so that I can efficiently monitor my patients' health and maintain communication with them without feeling overwhelmed by the system.
